name: Catch the Sea Animals
description:
You need to find them. As you walk around a neighborhood, your smartphone will vibrate when there’s a Ocean hero nearby. Take aim and throw a Ball… You’ll have to stay alert, or it might get away!

As you level up, you’ll be able to fight & catch more-powerful Hero & Monster. You can add to your collection by hatching Eggs based on the distances you walk. Help your Hero & Monster evolve by catching many of the same kind.
